filterbylinedesc: Select your favorite lines: they’ll be filtered!
statenormal: Phew! No major crowding. Have a nice trip!
statecrowded: The bus is crowded... but there’s still room!
toastnobus: No buses currently running... 💤 See you soon!!
toastcriticalerror: A critical error occurred. We’re currently investigating the issue.
toastunsupportedlocation: Location is not supported on this device.
toastfatalerror: An internal error occurred! Please contact MyBusFinder support and provide this error code:
updatingdynamicdata: Updating dynamic database. This will take a few seconds 🙂
errordynamicdata: Oh no! An error occurred... did you refresh the page?
internalerror: An internal error occurred. Please contact MyBusFinder support.
selectstopanddestination: Select a stop and a destination
noserviceavailable: No service available for this date.
nobusonline: No buses running on this date.
nobusforthisstop: No schedule available at this stop.
positiondesc: Locate me on the map and show nearby stops.
satellitedesc: Toggle between satellite and classic map view.
greetings-morning1: Good morning! Ready for a new day?
greetings-morning2: Morning buses are perfect for finishing your sleep, right? 😴
greetings-morning3: Did you know? The first urban bus appeared in 1662 in Paris!
greetings-morning5: A coffee and a bus ticket — the perfect morning combo! ☕
greetings-morning6: Let passengers off before boarding, it makes everything smoother! 😉
greetings-midday1: Lunch break coming up! Where to? 🍽️
greetings-midday2: Fun fact: The word ‘bus’ comes from ‘omnibus’, meaning ‘for all’ in Latin!
greetings-midday3: Quick ride or a digestive bus stroll?
greetings-midday4: Public transport is also great for a micro-nap! 😌
greetings-midday5: Bus drivers have a secret button to extend green lights! (Well... sometimes 🤫)
greetings-midday6: Enjoy the calm of this hour for a peaceful ride. 🚌
greetings-afternoon2: Did you know some electric buses charge while driving? 🔋
greetings-afternoon3: Pro tip: avoid rear doors if the bus is crowded! (just kidding... or not)
greetings-afternoon4: A crowded bus is like life-sized Tetris. 🏗️
greetings-afternoon5: Is your favorite station well served?
greetings-afternoon6: Good afternoon! Don’t forget to validate your ticket! 🎟️
greetings-evening2: Off we go for an eco-friendly ride! 🌿
greetings-evening3: Feel like a night ride on public transport?
greetings-evening4: After a long day, a bus seat is pure gold. 😌
greetings-evening5: Watch out, the last bus won’t wait!
greetings-evening6: Different vibe in public transport at night, right?
greetings-night2: Night buses are sometimes called 'Nocturnes' or 'Noctiliens', depending on the city!
greetings-night3: Night drivers have the best stories!
greetings-night4: It’s quieter at this time, enjoy the ride 🛤️
greetings-night5: A guaranteed seat at this hour!
greetings-night6: Watch the city light up through the window, it’s magical! ✨
creditssubtitle: Your mobility companion for better commuting
tothetestpeople: To everyone who tested the app and gave feedback.
totheusers: To our users for their trust.
predictstext: Ultra-precise forecasts, even in unexpected situations. Never miss a bus again, always at the right time.
betteriutext: Smoother, more intuitive. Everything you need, just a swipe away.
alwayswithuyoutext: Access your favorite routes even offline. Your data syncs as soon as you're back online.
thirdstepnostrong: 3: Access My Bus Finder in one tap!
aliandroid: Direct access to your mobility companion
cliandroid: The full My Bus Finder experience
